control.visible: Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets) | Container.Content(TVShows) | Container.Content(Seasons) | Container.Content(Episodes) | $EXP[AlbumsSongsArtists] | Container.Content(MusicVideos) | String.Contains(Container.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.program)

itemlayout.condition: Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,1) | Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,3) | Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,4) | Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,6) | Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,7) | Skin.String(ProgramsListInfo2Style,9)
